title: Need Help From Riot Regarding Honor System
body:
Hello Riot,

Around the beginning of the honor system release i got a 25 game chat restriction. It has probably been about 25+ games since my restriction was lifted and I am still locked at level 1. When do I get unlocked again? I figured it was only for the duration of the punishment, but still nothing.

replies.body: Be sure to check out the full [**Honor FAQ **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) but essentially you'll need to keep playing clean, positive games until your honor level is unlocked. You'll get a special notification when that happens, and then you'll be able to start earning Honor XP again.
